start.text: We take our own back today.
Forward, in the name of freedom.
That frigate crew, I know their admiral, they ordered the bombardment on my planet. Can I have that one?

start_boss.text: And it is our duty to those whose freedoms have been taken to claim victory.

retreat.text: As we used to say before the takeover, a living day is a good day.
No need to fret, we can come back with more ships.

need_help.text: Just like the Hegemon' raid on Maxinos

running.text: Sorry, but we need to leave.
We can't fight if we're all dead.

hull_50.text: Engineering isn't responding. It's like the aftermath of a Hegemon' takeover in here.

hull_30.text: I think we're on our way out. Give 'em hell, captain.

overload.text: Someone get this thing off us!

death.text: Not today, please not today. DAMN YOU. DAMN Y..*Commline ends*

victory.text: That looks like the last of them.
They're running! Lets get out of here.
